sentence.Network_en: The diaries are a mixture of confession, work in progress and observation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些日记里既有自白，也有当下工作记录，还有见闻评论。

sentence.Network_en: The diaries are a mixture of confession and observation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些日记既有自白，也有评论。

sentence.Network_en: She was undernourished, an observation that prompted yet another unasked question.
sentence.Network_cn: 她看上去营养不良，这一发现又引出了一个未被问及的问题。

jx.jx_en_mean: (especially of a patient or a suspected criminal) being closely and constantly watched or monitored
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指病人或嫌疑犯）在观察中；在监视中

lj.lj_ly: he spent two nights in hospital under observation.
lj.lj_ls: 他在医院里被观察了两夜。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'respectful adherence to the requirements of (rules, a ritual, etc.)'): from Latin observatio(n-), from the verb observare (see observe)

entry.def: Observation is the action or process of carefully watching someone or something.

example.ex: ...careful observation of the movement of the planets...
example.tran: 对行星运动的仔细观测

example.ex: In hospital she'll be under observation all the time.
example.tran: 医院会对她24小时密切观察。

entry.tran: 观察所得；观察资料；观测数据
entry.def: An observation is something that you have learned by seeing or watching something and thinking about it.

example.ex: This book contains observations about the causes of addictions.
example.tran: 该书包括有关成瘾原因的观察发现。

entry.tran: （通常指观察后发表的）评论，言论
entry.def: If a person makes an observation, they make a comment about something or someone, usually as a result of watching how they behave.

example.ex: 'You're an obstinate man,' she said. 'Is that a criticism,' I said, 'or just an observation?'.
example.tran: “你是个很执拗的人，”她说道。“你这是批评呢，”我说，“还是只是发表评论而已？”

entry.def: Observation is the ability to pay a lot of attention to things and to notice more about them than most people do.

example.ex: She has good powers of observation.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of making and recording a measurement
2. the act of observing; taking a patient look

sentences.sentence: "he reported his observations to the mayor"

means.word_mean: 4. the act of noticing or paying attention;

sentences.sentence: "he escaped the notice of the police"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is an observation backed up by the links.

auth_sentence.content: Evolution is built on observation, not on belief.
auth_sentence.res_content: Evolution is built on observation, not on belief.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Evolution is built on observation, not on belief.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奴隶状态,惩役,地役权,使用权
stems_affixes.word_buile: serv服务+itude状态→服务的状态→奴隶状态,惩役
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存
de加强+serv服务+e→加强服务→值得[重视]
dis不,坏+serv服务+e→坏的服务→危害

stems_affixes.value_cn: 观察,观测,注意到,监视,遵守,评述,说
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强动作+serv保持+e→一直保持→遵守,引申为观察
pre预先+serv保留+e→预先保留→保存
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
serv服务+ice→n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修

Sentence.sentence: Children also learn to behave as boys or girls through observation and imitation.
Muir's learning in observation throughout his life led him to devote his last years to preserving the natural environment.
How do the scientists interpret their observation from the experiment?

sentences.en: The new breed is under observation.
She is a student of keen observation.
sentences.cn: 她是一个观察力敏锐的学生。

means.word_mean: 言论, 评论, 意见

sentences.en: He made valuable observations on the prices.
sentences.cn: 他对物价问题提出了宝贵的意见。

means.word_mean: 观察资料, 观察数据

sentences.en: He's just published observations on Japanese bird life.
sentences.cn: 他刚刚发表了关于日本鸟类生活的观察资料。
